SchedulerItemMetadata.name: Scheduler Log Database Cleanup

parameter.description: Specify how many days of scheduler execution logs information to keep.
parameter.name: keep.days

SchedulerItemMetadata.shortDescription: This task deletes all scheduler task execution logs older than the number of days specified in keep.days parameter.
SchedulerItemMetadata.shortHtmlDescription: This task deletes all scheduler task execution logs older than the number of days specified in keep.days parameter.
SchedulerItemMetadata.longHtmlDescription: This task deletes all scheduler task execution logs older than the number of days specified in keep.days parameter. The data is delete from the Mayhem database SchedulerLog table.
